template.template: Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3
template.name: Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3
template.description:
Zabbix template for Microsoft SQL Server Agent.
Tested on Microsoft SQL Server 2012, 2014, 2016 and 2019. It may work with earlier versions, but some items (with missing performance counters) may be unsupported. Tested on Zabbix 3.4.0. and 4.0.0. It may work with earlier versions, but some items (for example service.info[service,<param>]) may be unsupported.
For Low Level Discovery to work additional scripts must be configured.
Mantas Tumenas. mantas.tumenas@gmail.com

discovery_rule.name: SQL Server Agent Discovery
discovery_rule.description: SQL Server Agent discovery with additional scripts lets discover Microsoft SQL Server Agent and it's objects.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLAGENTNAME} Agent: Critical Errors
item_prototype.description:
Microsoft SQL Server Agent critical errors from Microsoft Windows Event Viewer.
Application (program) events. The Application log contains events logged by applications or programs. Events are classified as error, warning, or information, depending on the severity of the event. An error is a significant problem, such as loss of data. A warning is an event that isn't necessarily significant, but might indicate a possible future problem. An information event describes the successful operation of a program, driver, or service.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLAGENTNAME} Agent: Service State

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:eventlog[Application,,"Critical","{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}",,,skip].strlen()}>0 and {TRIGGER.VALUE}=0
trigger_prototype.recovery_expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:eventlog[Application,,"Critical","{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}",,,skip].nodata(86400)}=1 or {TRIGGER.VALUE}=0
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLAGENTNAME} Agent:Critical Errors
trigger_prototype.description:
INCIDENT REQUIRES MANUAL CLOSURE in the ZABBIX Microsoft SQL Server Agent critical errors from Microsoft Windows Event Viewer.
Application (program) events. The Application log contains events logged by applications or programs. Events are classified as error, warning, or information, depending on the severity of the event. An error is a significant problem, such as loss of data. A warning is an event that isn't necessarily significant, but might indicate a possible future problem. An information event describes the successful operation of a program, driver, or service.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#1)}>0 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#1)}<255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#2)}>0 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#2)}<255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#3)}>0 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:service.info[{#SQLAGENTSERVICE}].last(#3)}<255
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLAGENTNAME} Agent: Service State {ITEM.LASTVALUE}

discovery_rule.name: SQL Server Agent Jobs P1 Discovery
discovery_rule.description: SQL Server Agent Job discovery with additional scripts lets discover Microsoft SQL Server Agent Jobs.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Database Maintenance Jobs: Total
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent jobs, which are in job category Database Maintenance.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Database Maintenance Jobs: Enabled
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent jobs, which are in job category Database Maintenance and are enabled

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Database Maintenance Jobs: Executed in the last {$DAYS} Days
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent jobs, which are in job category Database Maintenance and have been executed in the last {$DAYS} days.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Database Maintenance Jobs: Scheduled
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent jobs, which are in job category Database Maintenance and are scheduled

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Job P1 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Outcome
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp1.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp1.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp1.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp1.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P1 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
trigger_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

discovery_rule.name: SQL Server Agent Jobs P2 Discovery
discovery_rule.description: SQL Server Agent Job discovery with additional scripts lets discover Microsoft SQL Server Agent Jobs.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Job P2 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Outcome
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P2 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
trigger_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#3)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#3)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#3)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#3)}<>255
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P2 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
trigger_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

dependency.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P2 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
dependency.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp2.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255

discovery_rule.name: SQL Server Agent Jobs P3 Discovery
discovery_rule.description: SQL Server Agent Job discovery with additional scripts lets discover Microsoft SQL Server Agent Jobs.

item_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Server Agent Job P3 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Outcome
item_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#2)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}>080000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}<160000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}>=1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}<=5
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P3 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
trigger_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.

dependency.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P3 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
dependency.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}>080000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}<160000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}>=1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}<=5

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>4 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>11 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].last(#1)}<>255 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}>080000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].time()}<160000 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}>=1 and {Template Microsoft SQL Server SA Tier 3:tier3.jobsp3.mssql.status[{#SQLINSTANCENAME},{#JOBNAME}].dayofweek()}<=5
trigger_prototype.name: SQL Instance {#SQLINSTANCENAME} Agent Job P3 "{#JOBNAME}": Last Run Not Succeedded
trigger_prototype.description: Provides information about Microsoft SQL Server Agent job last run outcome.
